des: "This is a quick appetizer that's tasty! Serve with tortilla chips. Blue chips make the dip even more colorful!"
ins: In a medium bowl, use a hand mixer to blend cream cheese, salsa and mild Cheddar cheese. Spread the mixture into a medium serving dish. Sprinkle with black olives, green onions and red bell pepper. Cover and chill in the refrigerator until serving.
